author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-4410: NullPointerException when USING clause contains all columns in both join tables
Adjust index properly when looping through the result columns and
expanding *. The old code didn't expect the number of columns to
decrease after the expansion and could therefore potentially skip
the processing of some of the columns.

author: uschindler
msg: We can only remove this in 3.x at earliest (depending on our policy change).

author: sergeyb
msg: [CXF-2493] : applying a patch on behalf of Colm
